text: A Flan is a kind of tart found in British cuisine. It consists of an open pastry or sponge case holding a sweet or savoury filling. A typical flan is round, with shortcrust pastry. ==Recipe== Flan Brillat-Savarin, a savoury flan named in honour of the French gastronome Jean Anthelme Brillat-Savarin: # Bake blind a savoury flan case # Fill the cooked flan case with a mixture of scrambled eggs and truffles # Slice more truffles, heat in butter, season, and arrange on the egg mixture. # Sprinkle with grated Parmesan cheese, and put in an oven or under a grill (broiler) to brown well. ==Related pages== * Quiche ==References== Category:Pies
title: Flan
